attributes.action: stop utilities putting additional service charges on household bills
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BT have just added a service charge of £4.50, but say they have reduced line rental! Pensioners, especially those that have been with company for over 50 years deserve to be rewarded not penalized. Why should pensioners have to pay by DD especially if they don't want to just to get this service charge of their bill!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
